item.title: ‘The Housemaid’ Snaps Sydney Sweeney’s Rotten Tomatoes Streak
item.description: Sydney Sweeney's new movie, The Housemaid, has broken a Rotten Tomatoes streak of underperforming films. It could do so at the box office, as well.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Saturday, December 20
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: iOS 18.7.3—Which iPhones Can Run Apple’s Critical New Update?
item.description: Apple has released iOS 18.7.3, but it's not available for all iPhones. As Apple tries to push users to iOS 26.2, which iPhones can run iOS 18.7.3?

item.title: DraftKings Enters Prediction Markets With New App
item.description: The success of Kalshi and Polymarket has prompted a raft of competitors to launch similar products.

item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.
